outputs.output_descr:
Cooperation between UNDP and Shell in Iraq for environmental sustainability and social development could comprise a wide range of programmes focusing on knowledge building, community support and basic service delivery as well as private sector development for job creation and economic opportunities.

Strategic interventions in the economy of Basra and Missan governorates may be jointly designed and implemented to ensure UNDP goals for poverty reduction, climate change control and protection of environment, economic diversification and SME expansion and responsible business promotion will be reflected into the agenda of local authorities and stakeholders for years to come.

project_descr: The project aims to increase the number of local area development activities, promote local small and medium enterprises and provide vocational training to respond to the private sector's needs.
